about_the_game:
Installment and update
To install and run the DLC smoothly, players need to purchase the official version of The Vigilant Villa in the first place, which includes all contents from [ Chapter 1 to 8 ]as well as the [Tracing back Plots] part. As you’re playing, don’t forget to check the network connection of your device.

The Vigilant Villa: Street hidden in darkness, we provide extra story lines of Ingram Fang，Daisy Mo and Leo Liu. Entrance of this line will be found on login page. We also suggest players to unlock this line after they finish the first round of the game.

For players who have missed our beta tests, and those who only have [The Traveler in Fog] & [Agatha's Eye] left unlocked, please do send a screenshot of your achievements page as well as your Steam account (name or Id) to our mailbox 1707241484@qq.com; we’ll send an activation code of these unfinished achievements within seven days as soon as we confirm your account status.

short_description: The Vigilant Villa is a plots-oriented, texts-based AVG adventure game inheriting the classic “A locked room mystery" story mode. Where the game heads towards is completely decided by player’s own deductions and choices.
